
```{r import}
# Import TRI data here! 
library(readr)
X2021_tx <- read_csv("2021_tx.csv")
View(X2021_tx)
# Be sure to filter to your county

# Also be convert releases into a common unit of measure using a single line of code
library(readr)
texas_tri <- read_csv("~/SDS LAB 100/SDS192git/SDS192/2021_tx.csv")
View(texas_tri)

dallas_texas_tri <- 
  texas_tri |>
  filter(`7. COUNTY` == "DALLAS")

view(dallas_texas_tri)

dallas_texas_tri |>
  filter(`47. UNIT OF MEASURE` != "Pounds")

```
